meanings.definition: Not acclimated; not adapted or accustomed to a new climate, environment, or situation.
meanings.sent1: The unacclimated explorer shivered in the cold forest.
meanings.sent2: She felt unacclimated to the bustling city life after living in a quiet town.
meanings.sent3: The unacclimated penguin tried to sunbathe on the icy glacier.
meanings.sent4: His unacclimated mind was a fish out of water in the fast-paced office.
meanings.sent5: The unacclimated plant withered under the harsh desert sun.
